summary: This document is an email chain from July 2019 where an informant contacts law enforcement about a former Epstein employee who was allegedly approached to recruit girls for Epstein after his incarceration. The informant also discusses attempts to intimidate victims, potential connections to political figures, and requests protection for their information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the case; the informant discusses his recruitment attempts after incarceration and his associates.

persons.name: Gordon Ackley
persons.role: Yacht & media outlet owner, licensed microwave wireless operator
persons.context: Mentioned as having a decade-old business relationship with Epstein in the US Virgin Islands, with links to VIGOP organizations.

persons.name: Dennis Hastert
persons.context: Referenced in relation to 'Foleygate' and his predatory nature; the informant claims to have consulted for his opponent in 2006.

persons.name: Dylan Howard
persons.context: Allegedly received information about the case from an attorney, prompting a shift in media narrative to 'Pizzagate' as an intimidation tactic.

connections.description: Had a > decade-old business relationship according to the informant, involving yachts, media, and microwave wireless operations in the USVI.
Epstein allegedly employed someone after his release from house arrest, who was later asked to recruit 'girls' for him.
An attorney allegedly gave information about the case to Dylan Howard at AMI, leading to a media narrative shift.

events.title: Communication with Epstein employee begins
events.description: The informant states they have been in communication with someone since December 2016 who claims to have been an employee of Jeffrey Epstein after his release from house arrest.

events.title: Informant reports recruitment attempts
events.description: The informant emails law enforcement about an Epstein employee who was allegedly asked to procure 'girls' for Epstein after his incarceration, and discusses ongoing intimidation attempts.

events.title: SMARTech breach timing
events.description: The informant references the significance of the timing of the SMARTech breach linked to Dennis Hastert's 2015 indictment.

keyFacts: An informant reports communication with a former Epstein employee who was allegedly asked to recruit 'girls' for Epstein after his release from incarceration.
The informant describes ongoing attempts to intimidate victims and private citizens, including veiled threats and doxxing attempts.
The informant mentions a business relationship between Epstein and Gordon Ackley in the US Virgin Islands involving microwave communications.
The informant alleges that an attorney gave case information to Dylan Howard at AMI, shifting media narrative to 'Pizzagate' to intimidate victims.
The informant references connections to political figures like Dennis Hastert and events like 'Foleygate' in the context of the Epstein case.
